name: GPT-4o Mini Search Preview (Mar 2025)
description: GPT-4o Mini Search Preview March 2025 release - a cost-efficient variant optimized for web search queries, with direct access to live web data at a lower token cost.
notes: March 11, 2025 release. Complex pricing structure: $25 per 1K searches plus standard GPT-4o Mini token rates ($0.15/$0.6 per 1M tokens) and additional $2 per 1M search tokens. Supports geolocation-based search customization via 'user_location' parameter. Designed for Chat Completions API with web_search_options parameter.
